"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>404b18c2-9c77-43cf-b343-57ca5135512b#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A serkentő és a gátló szinapszis</string>
            <string language="en">Stimulating and impedient synapse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anregende und impedient Synapse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Synapse stimulante et impedient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinapse estimulando e impedient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sinapsi di stimolazione ed impedient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποκίνηση και εμποδιστική σύναψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sinapsis que estimula e impedient</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A serkentő és a gátló szinapszisban lejátszódó elektromos változások összehasonlítása</string>
            <string language="en">Comparison of electric changes taking place in the stimulating and the impedient synapse</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szinapszis,  hiperpolarizáció,  gátló szinapszis,  serkentő szinapszis,  </string>
            <string language="en">synapse, hyperpolarization, impedient synapse, stimulating synapse</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleich der elektrischen Änderungen, die in der
anregenden und impedient Synapse stattfinden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison des changements électriques 
intervenant de la synapse stimulante et impedient</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação das mudanças elétricas que ocorrem 
na sinapse estimulando e impedient</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto dei cambiamenti elettrici che avvengono 
nella sinapsi di stimolazione ed impedient</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση των ηλεκτρικών αλλαγών που πραγματοποιούνται 
στην υποκίνηση και την εμποδιστική σύναψη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación de los cambios eléctricos que 
ocurren en la sinapsis que estimula e impedient</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synapse, Hyperpolarization, impedient Synapse, anregende
Synapse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">synapse, hyperpolarisation, synapse impedient, synapse 
stimulante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinapse, hyperpolarization, sinapse impedient, sinapse 
estimulando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sinapsi, hyperpolarization, sinapsi impedient, sinapsi 
di stimolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύναψη, hyperpolarization, εμποδιστική σύναψη, 
παρακινητική σύναψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sinapsis, hiperpolarización, sinapsis impedient, 
sinapsis que estimula</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;
fn:

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
